keyword: how many calories in a wing
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Wing?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a wing, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Wing?
assumptions: One medium chicken wing section (drumette or flat, ~85 g with bone), skin-on, roasted or baked, no sauce or breading.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cut, cooking method, brand, and added ingredients like sauces. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken wing with skin has about 99 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken wing with skin?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for one roasted wing with skin.

faqs.q: Are chicken wings high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, one wing provides ~9 g protein, great for muscle support.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in a wing?
faqs.a: Around 7 g total fat per wing, mostly from the skin.
Plain wings have 0 g carbs; breading or sauces add them.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in a wing?
faqs.a: Roasted/baked: ~99 kcal; fried can add 50+ kcal from oil.
